display_long_description:
Hand-picked by **Meta** for the **Oculus Ignition Program**, an honor extended to only a handful of VR projects, **RAGER** is the VR melee-rhythm brawler that hurls you into a roaring battleground, sets relentless robots on you, and lets hard-hitting music power every swing, block, and dodge—each move sparking to the beat as you rise to become the ultimate RAGER.

# CAMPAIGN
A ​linear run of **12 hand-built levels** including **3 boss fights**. The game picks a different weapon for each stage, so you’re forced to learn every fighting style. Every level offers three difficulties and its own high-score board.

# FREESTYLE
A second set of **12 levels**, all unlocked from the moment you start. Pick any weapon you’ve earned, set the difficulty, and chase high scores without limits. Perfect for trying wild load-outs or just jumping straight to your favourite stage.

# SURVIVAL
One wide-open arena, **endless waves**. The longer you stay alive, the faster and meaner the robots get. Last as long as you can, then try to last a little longer.

# WEAPONS
- **One-Handed** - Sword & Mace
- **Two-Handed** - Axe & Hammer
- **Close-Quarters** - Claws & Fists

# LEVEL EDITOR
Load any **song you like**, drop enemies onto the timeline, and jump in. Tweak the pattern until it feels perfect, then play your custom level for high scores.
